1341140.name: Enoma: A New Beginning
1341140.description:
Enoma: A New Beginning is a casual simulation game with a touch of puzzle. A group of survivors arrives on the mysterious island of Enoma. Help them stay alive while discovering the island's many mysteries. Build, farm, grow, solve puzzles and be dazzled by this beautiful and relaxing island.

Features:


  • Reconstruct the central village.
  • Restore the natural state of the island.
  • Grow your small group into a village.
  • Find sources of food for your villagers.
  • Solve puzzles to discover the many mysteries of Enoma.
  • And explore this beautiful and peaceful island.
1341140.supported_languages:
英语*, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
